entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snowshower, -8.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sault Ste. Marie Airport 3:53 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
Condition: Light Snowshower
Temperature: -8.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa rising
Visibility: 4.0 km
Humidity: 65 %
Wind Chill: -18
Dewpoint: -14.1°C

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 40%
